emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: honoree Harry E. Lennox, Postmaster Edward G. Coll, Mrs. Harry E. Lennox, Arthur T. Burwell, Woodrow W. Mellott, presenting desk set to Mr. Lennox, and John Sparaco, gathered in Loendi Club for testimonial
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 8 reads: "Mailers Honor Lennox - Harry E. Lennox (left), a past president and founder of Local 19 of the Mail Handlers Association, receives a desk set from Woodrow W. Mellott, local president, at a testimonial held in his honor, Monday night, at the Loendi Club. Left to right: The honoree, Postmaster Edward G. Coll, Mrs. Lennox, Arthur T. Burwell, Local 19 executive secretary; Mr. Mellott and John Sparaco, chairman and member of the national executive board. - Harris Photo."
